chapter.text: Asim nuha nu usa di kauma vala rasula bana ke bheji'a ki apani kauma de lokam nu savadhana kara devem, isa tom' pahilam ki unham ute ika daradanaka afata a jave
Usa ne akhi'a ki he mairi kauma de! Maim tuhade la'i ika sapasata dara'una vala ham
Ki tusim alaha di ibadata karo ate usa tom daro ate meri agi'a da palana karo

Alaha tuhade papam nu mu'afa kara devega ate tuhanu ika mithe ho'e samem taka mauka devega besaka jadom alaha da mithi'a ho'i'a samam a janda hai phira uha tali'a nahim janda, kasa! Tusim usa nu janade
Nuha ne akhi'a ki he meri'a raba! Maim apani kaumma nu dina ate rata nu pukari'a
Paratu meri pukara ne unham di (mere tom) duri vica hi vadha kita

Ate maim jadom vi unham nu sula'i'a ki tusim unham nu mu'afa kara di'u tam unham ne apane kanam vica ungala pa la'i'am ate apane upara apane kapare lapeta la'e ate jida te ara ga'e ate bahuta hi hakara kita
Phira maim unham nu khul'ha ke pukari'a
Phira maim unham vicakara samuhaka taura te pracara kita ate unham nu hauli jihi samajha'i'a
Saim kiha ki apane raba tom mu'afi mago besaka uha bara mu'afi dena vala hai
Uha tuhade te asamana vicom kafi pani varasa'ega
Ate tuhadi ja'idada ate tuhadi aulada vica vadha karega ate tuhade la'i baga paida karega ate tuhade la'i nahiram vaga devega
Tuhanu ki ho gi'a hai ki tusim alaha di mahanata nu nahim manade ho
Halanki usa ne tuhanu tar'ham-tar'ham nala bana'i'a
Ki tusim dekhi'a nahim ki alaha ne kisa tar'ham ika te ika sata asamana bana'e
Ate usa ne cana nu prakasa ate suraja nu diva bana'i'a
Ate alaha ne tuhanu dharati vicom visesa dhaga nala paida kita
Phira uha tuhanu dharati vica vapisa lai javega ate phira usa vicom tuhanu sahara lai avega
Ate alaha ne tuhade la'i dharati nu padhara bana'i'a hai
Tam ki tusi usa de caure rasati'am te calo
Nuha ne akhi'a he meri'a raba! Inham ne mera akhi'a nahim mani'a ate ajihe badi'am da palana kita' jinham di ja'idada ate aulada ne unham de nukasana vica hi vadha kita
Ate inham ne bare chala-kapata kite
Ate inham ne kiha ki tusim apane pujanikam nu kade vi na chadi'u. Ate tusim kade vi vada nu ate na sava'a nu ate nam yagusa nu ate na yaguka nu ate na nasara nu chadana
Ate unham ne bahuta sare lokam nu bhataka dita. Ate huna tu inham kurahi lokam di gumarahi vica vadha kara
Apane papam de karana uha dobe ga'e ate phira aga vica sute ga'e. Tam unham ne apane la'i alaha tom baca'una vala ko'i madadagara na pa'i'a
Ate nuha ne akhi'a ki he mere palanahara! Tu inham avagi'akari'am vicom dharati te ko'i vasana vala na chada
Jekara tu inham nu chada dita tam iha tere sadi'am nu bhataka'unage. Ate inham de vasa vica jihara painda hovega uha vibhacari ate sakhata avagi'akari hi hovega

He mere palanahara! Mainu mu'afa kara de ate mere mata pita nu mu'afa kara de. Ate jihara mere ghara vica saradhavana ho ke dakhila hove tu usa nu vi mu'afa kara de. Ate sare pavitara maradam ate auratam nu mu'afa kara de. Ate ati'acari'am la'i vinasa tom`binham kise ciza vica vadha na kara
